'''Whirling Traction''' is an [[aura]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Anemo vortexes spawn at 12-second intervals.
* Each vortex lasts for 1.5 seconds and deals DMG at 0.4-second intervals. After 1.6s, the vortex will explode, dealing an additional instance of AoE DMG.
